Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GuiMapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GuiMapController
  • public class GuiMapController
extends java.lang.Object
    contains the controller of the gui, alla the methods that works on the gui are here

      Same as checkPayWithPowerUp but simpler version, which in case you don't need to specify local ammo and powerups will just read them from cacheModel and then call the main checkPayWithPowerUps method with them as parameters

      • setValidMove

        public void setValidMove​(int validMove)
        Method useful for movements. First the client calls askMoveValid, with a single direction, the the server reply back to the client throught this setter, and it sets validMove to true if the direction is valid (no walls, nor out of map), otherwise false
        Parameters:
        validMove - boolean, true if direction is valid, false otherwise

      • checkPayWithPowerUp

        private void checkPayWithPowerUp​(java.util.List<Color> cost,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> weaponNames,
                                 java.util.List<Directions> dir,
                                 java.lang.String actionType,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> effects)
        Same as checkPayWithPowerUp but simpler version, which in case you don't need to specify local ammo and powerups will just read them from cacheModel and then call the main checkPayWithPowerUps method with them as parameters
        Parameters:
        cost - to be checked
        weaponNames - in position 0 weapon i want to discard, in position 1 weapon iw ant to buy
        actionType - contins the type of cation: BUY or SHOOT or RELOAD

      • checkPayWithPowerUp

        private void checkPayWithPowerUp​(java.util.List<Color> cost,
                                 java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUps,
                                 java.util.List<Color> ammo,
                                 int costCount,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> weaponNames,
                                 java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUpsToDiscard,
                                 java.util.List<Directions> dir,
                                 java.lang.String actionType,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> effects)
        Parameters:
        cost - cost to be checked if payable with powerups
        powerUps - take powerups as parameter because you can remove some of them for partial cost checks
        ammo - take ammo as parameter because you can remove some of them for partial checks
        costCount - contains the index of which ammo i'm checking
        weaponNames - contains the weapon i want to discrad(0) e the weapon i want to buy (1)
        actionType - contains the type of cation: BUY or SHOOT or RELOAD

      • hasPowerUpOfColor

        private boolean hasPowerUpOfColor​(java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUps,
                                  Color c)
        Parameters:
        powerUps - list of CachedPowerUps to be checked
        c - color to find
        Returns:
        true if the powerups list contains a powerup of the specified color, false otherwise

      • canReload

        private boolean canReload​(java.lang.String weapon,
                          java.util.List<Color> ammoCubes,
                          java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUps)
        Parameters:
        weapon - name of the weapon to be checked
        ammoCubes - list of ammocubes copied from cachemodel (can be modified by methods)
        powerUps - list of powerups copied from cachemodel (can be modified by methods, to track local changes)
        Returns:
        true if the weapon can be reloaded with current powerups and ammo, false otherwise
